author: boudoul
body:
This PR intends to fix the unit test broken after the deprecation of some of the phase2 scenario from this PR #18852 .
Here I changed the tests from D7 (deprecated) to D17 (current baseline for TDRs) . Also D4 is deprecrated, I choosed to replace D4 by D11 which contains the C1 calo .
I hope thise changes are ok with @ianna
title: Use non-deprecated phase2 scenario in detector description unit tests
